synopsis.text:
Long after the formidable Majin Buu's defeat, a new menace stirs, endangering the tranquility of Earth and the universe. Beerus, the ancient and powerful God of Destruction, rises from his prolonged slumber, intrigued by the tales of a Saiyan warrior who vanquished the notorious Frieza. Eager for a worthy adversary, Beerus sets his sights on Goku, the hero of Earth.

Goku, thrilled by the prospect of a new challenge, engages Beerus in combat but is swiftly overpowered, realizing the immense threat Beerus poses to the universe's existence. With the stakes higher than ever, Goku and his loyal friends, the Z-fighters, must devise a strategy to halt Beerus' destructive intentions. Their only hope lies in Goku's potential to attain the legendary status of a Super Saiyan God, a power unseen and unmatched.

Set within the official Dragon Ball timeline, this story unfolds during the peaceful era after Majin Buu's downfall, featuring familiar faces like Vegeta, Piccolo, and Krillin. As Beerus' power dwarfs even the gods, will Goku and his allies succeed in safeguarding Earth and the universe from the wrath of the God of Destruction? Only time will tell in this thrilling chapter of the Dragon Ball saga.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
